body:
UPDATE: Because of Awesomerp's request, I made a website!

In the midst of all of the argument about new rules, new gamemodes, and staff applications, I'd like to present this thread, dedicated to toasters.

While being at home sick this morning, I realized that I hadn't used our new toaster.  It holds 4 slices of bread and is also a convection oven.  It made the best toast I have ever had.

title: Toaster Appreciation Thread
